TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObjectParameter extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示传递给对象查询的查询参数。

span.span: Represents a query parameter that is passed to an object query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示传递给 或查询生成器方法的查询参数。Represents a query parameter that is passed to an or a query builder method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 对象参数由名称、类型和值组成。Object parameters consist of a name, a type, and a value. 此类不能被继承。This class cannot be inherited. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例向集合添加新参数。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它循环访问 并显示集合中每个参数的名称、类型和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, type, and value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_parameters)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_parameters)]

related.span: 以对象形式查询数据（实体框架）

span.span: Querying Data as Objects (Entity Framework)

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, object value) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, value As Object)

param.name: name

span.span: The parameter name.

param.span: 此名称不应包含“@”参数标记（它用在 [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 语句中），只能为实际名称。

span.span: This name should not include the "@" parameter marker that is used in [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] statements, only the actual name.

param.span: 表达式的第一个字符必须为字母。

span.span: The first character of the expression must be a letter.

param.span: 表达式中的所有后续字符都必须为字母、数字或下划线 (_) 字符。

span.span: Any successive characters in the expression must be either letters, numbers, or an underscore (_) character.

param.name: value
param.span: 参数的初始值（及固有类型）。

span.span: The initial value (and inherently, the type) of the parameter.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称和值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用指定的名称和值创建一个参数。This constructor creates a parameter from the specified name and value. 根据参数的值推断其类型。The type of the parameter is inferred from the value. 添加到 后，该参数名称不能进行更改。When added to the , the parameter name cannot be changed. 该参数值可以通过 属性进行更改。The parameter value can be changed through the property. 编译查询后，该值不能进行更改。After the query has been compiled, the value cannot be changed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例向集合添加新参数。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它循环访问 并显示集合中每个参数的名称、类型和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, the type and the value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_parameters)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Parameters](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_parameters)]

exception.span: 如果任一自变量的值为 null。

span.span: If the value of either argument is null.

exception.span: 如果名称自变量的值无效。

span.span: If the value of the name argument is not valid.

exception.span: 参数名称必须以字母开头，并且只能包含字母、数字和下划线。

span.span: Parameter names must start with a letter and can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

param.name: name

span.span: The parameter name.

param.span: 此名称不应包含“@”参数标记（它用在 [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 语句中），只能为实际名称。

span.span: This name should not include the "@" parameter marker that is used in the [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] statements, only the actual name.

param.span: 表达式的第一个字符必须为字母。

span.span: The first character of the expression must be a letter.

param.span: 表达式中的所有后续字符都必须为字母、数字或下划线 (_) 字符。

span.span: Any successive characters in the expression must be either letters, numbers, or an underscore (_) character.

param.name: type
param.span: 参数的公共语言运行库 (CLR) 类型。

span.span: The common language runtime (CLR) type of the parameter.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称和类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例化后，该参数名称不能进行更改。When instantiated, the parameter name cannot be changed. 该参数值可以通过 属性进行设置或更改。The parameter value can be set or changed through the property. 编译查询后，该值不能进行更改。After the query has been compiled, the value cannot be changed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0).

exception.span: 如果任一自变量的值为 null。

span.span: If the value of either argument is null.

exception.span: 如果名称自变量的值无效。

span.span: If the value of the name argument is invalid.

exception.span: 参数名称必须以字母开头，并且只能包含字母、数字和下划线。

span.span: Parameter names must start with a letter and can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

summary.span: 获取参数名称，该名称只能通过构造函数进行设置。

span.span: Gets the parameter name, which can only be set through a constructor.

value.span: 参数名称，它只能通过构造函数进行设置。

span.span: The parameter name, which can only be set through a constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例化后，该参数名称不能进行更改。When instantiated, the parameter name cannot be changed. 该参数值可以通过 属性进行设置或更改。The parameter value can be set or changed through the property. 编译查询后，该值不能进行更改。After the query has been compiled, the value cannot be changed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例向集合添加新参数。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它循环访问 并显示集合中每个参数的名称、类型和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, type, and value of each parameter in the collection. set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets or sets the parameter value.
The parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编译查询后，该值不能进行更改。After the query has been compiled, the value cannot be changed. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 如果新值与构造函数中声明的类型不兼容，可能引发运行时异常。If the new value is incompatible with the type declared in the constructor, it might cause a run-time exception. 提供程序必须确定该值是否与声明的类型兼容。The provider must determine whether the value is compatible with the declared type. 例如，如果初始类型为 ，而新值为 ，则可能接收到异常。For example, if the initial type is and the new value is , you might receive an exception. ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例向集合添加新参数。The example adds new parameters to the collection. 它循环访问 并显示集合中每个参数的名称、类型和值。It iterates through the and displays the name, the type and the value of each parameter in the collection.
